note.p: Youngest daughter of Thomas Dunn, merchant, and his wife Ann Morton, of Sheffield. Married Henry Tibbats Stainton in 1846.
Census returns of England and Wales 1881 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG11/734/131/4)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1995 (Ancestry.com, accessed 8 October 2022)
England, select births and christenings, 1538–1975 (Ancestry.com, accessed 8 October 2022)
